page.title: 01GAZETTEER
page.content: Where are we ?(Miss Claridge,2 pages); Orton then and now (Ewan and Stephen,1 page);Asleep in the 20th century (Joanne and Helen,2 pages); Orton - buildings of note(Katie,1 page); Lives Mrs Brigg Mr Murray (Helen, Joanne, Katie,2 pages); Warton then and now (Alan and Chris, 1 page); A day on the farm (Rhiannon, 1 page); Employment and Travel - Statistics (Bethan,Rachael,Ewan,Alan, 2 pages); Interview - Mrs Baum - Pick - Resident of Warton (Louise,Rhiannon,Anna, 2 pages);Ivy House Farm,Warton, a farm typical of the area (Rhiannon,Sarah,Rachael,Bethan, 4 pages).
